did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Kayser, Emanuel. Die devonischen Bildungen der Eifel

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Handwritten copy in German, of Kayser's article, "Die devonischen Bildungen der Eifel."

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Kayser, Emanuel, Die devonischen Bildungen der Eifel, Crerar Ms 134, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Handwritten copy in German, of Kayser's article, "Die devonischen Bildungen der Eifel." Originally published in Zeitschrift der deutschen geologischen Gesellschaft, XXIII Band, (1871). Includes tables, and table of contents. Illustrated with one diagram, folded in. Copy made by Carl Riemann. Inscribed: "(Aus der) Zeitschr. der deutschen geologischen Gesellschaft, XXIII Band, pag. 289-376, 1871. excerpirt von Carl Riemann Marburg im Marz 1884." Signed on flyleaf: "Carl Riemann." Bound in three-quarter cloth over paper-covered boards.
